node.title: NFL Players Vote to Approve New CBA with 17-Game Schedule, Expanded Playoffs - Bleacher Report
node.description: The  NFL  players voted in favor of the NFL owners' proposed collective bargaining agreement Sunday, meaning a 17th regular-season game and expanded playoffs are on the way in the near future...

node.title: The NCAA canceled March basketball. We’re bringing it back. - syracuse.com
node.description: The NCAA might have canceled the greatest sporting event on the calendar – and, given the coronavirus pandemic, rightly so – but we have figured out a way to bring it back.
